summary:
Mod rebalances Skyrim to be more challenging, but without excesses. To be less like modern games and more like the real ones. My idea is not to ruin the fun, but to make Skyrim as challenging and fun as possible.

by MoveAlong
descriptionHtml:
Mod rebalances Skyrim to be more challenging, but without excesses. To be less like modern games and more like the real ones. My idea is not to ruin the fun, but to make Skyrim as challenging and fun as possible.

by MoveAlong


All features are now included in-game. No need for console commands.


------------------------------------

Dream Skyrim v 1.02

------------------------------------

:
1. Leather Bracers takes 2 leather. 
2. Crushing Fists now paralyzes target for 1 second.
3. Some changes in Unarmed and Unarmored perks requirements.
4. Warmaster - 15% chance to knockdown.
5. Lydia is now romanceble without console commands.
6. Added crafting of Hand Wraps
7. Added Arrow Crafting



Advised difficulty - Expert.

Joy to you!



Global changes:

- Unarmed Combat (craft Hand Wraps to use it)
- Unarmored Combat
- Potions only work over time now.
- New perks for Sneak, Destruction, Archery, Light and Heavy Armors.
- Destruction now allows to get advantages without dualcasting.
- Wanted to be a true Necromant with his little army? That\'s your chance.
- 1 new nuke for Alteration and Conjuration.
- Vampire\'s Drain is significantly stronger.
- Everyone is killable now. (except for children)



Alteration:
-Magic Resistance - now two levels - 15 and 30% 
-Mage Armor - now two levels - x2 and x3
-Flesh-spells from Alteration school got 25% manacost reduced and duration got doubled.
-got a nuke - Elemental Shock

Conjuration:
-increased summons duration
-optimized bound weapon perks
-Apprentice Conjuration gives new spell Life Drain
-Be an ultimate Summoner - Elemental Master or a leader of an Undead Army

Destruction:
-3 top left perks replaced with 1 new - Overpower.
-no stunlocks with Impact
-you can use 2 different elements and get other bonuses

Enchanting:
-Weapon-related perks optimized
-Reduced Fortify <SchoolName> and Mana Regen enchants

Illusion:
-increasead duration for party-buffs

Restoration:
-reduced skill requirements for most
-Necromage now gives additional bonus for physical attacks
-wards cost reduced
-recovery now gives more magic resistance
-don\'t use this school, if you\'ve got pale skin

Archery:
-massive rework on this tree, see it in-game
-Bonus damage cap on first perk - 150%
-Quick Shot - two levels - 30 and 60%
-Stagger Chance reduced
-slow-mo perk - deleted

Block:
-first perk max - 30%
-elemental protection - reduced
-deflect arrows - bug fixed
-quick reflexes - deleted

Heavy Armor
-juggernaut - max - 50%
-Fists of Steel - deleted
-New 100 perk
-left branch requirements lowered

Smithing
-No Daidric Smithing
-Plate armor is in the right branch now
-added Arrow Crafting

Two-Handed
-Stagger chance reduced

Light Armor
-reduced first perk values
-deft movement now gives - 15% dodge

Lockpicking
-got significantly harder to pick locks without perks

Sneak:
-reduced Backstab and Assassin\'s blade rates to x4.5 and x8
-remade Silent Roll and Shadow Warrior perks



Posibility of Unarmed Combat inspired by Woverdude
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8288

My Nexus page:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8891
author: MoveAlong
